body.name: Wireless Indoor Security Cameras,1080P Battery Powered Outdoor AI Motion Detection WiFi Home Camera with Siren, Spotlight, Color Night Vision,2-Way Talk, SD/Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 38 mins
features: 【1080P HD Full Color Night Vision, Video and Picture】Wireless, Rechargeable, Indoor/ Outdoor Camera provides 1080P quality live video and image. The security cameras wireless outdoor has two options for night vision: full-color mode and infrared mode with a 33ft visible range. It provides wide and clear vision, even at night, and gives your home peace of mind with continuous 24-hour per-day protection.

【100% Wire-Free, Waterproof, Rechargeable】The cameras for home security is completely wireless. Simple installation requires no power cords or network cable. This outdoor camera wireless provides 1-6 months of worry-free use per each charge. It is IP65 waterproof and can work in almost any weather and location.

【Smart Motion Detection & AI Analysis Recognition】This security camera has an AI PIR sensor with smart recognition designed to recognize people, vehicles, pets and packages. The App will push the notifications to your phone when it detects motion, allowing you constant access to the area you are monitoring.

【Spotlight Instant Siren & Two-Way Audio】The home security camera has a built-in microphone and speaker, allowing for real-time two-way audio calls. It has 3 instant sirens, a white spotlight, and a siren / talking feature. These options will allow you to draw attention to any unsavory visitors and communicate with them, from the safety of your home, and can scare away any thieves.

【Cloud/SD and Free 3-Day Cycle Cloud Storage】The outdoor security cameras provide a free 3-day rolling cycled cloud storage without any subscription, plus it supports SD card storage and cloud storage. In addition, it provides a 30-day free trial of advanced features, including AI recognition, upgraded cloud memory, custom alert areas, and more! The advanced features start at $2.99 per month after a 30-day free trial.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Vision Well We focus on the wireless security camera, strive to share the security and convenience with you through our dependable and easy-to-use items. It’s waterproof and completely wireless, which can be installed anywhere you want. It will give your home peace of mind with continuous 24 hours per day protection. One charge will provide 1-6 months battery life. Multiple users sharing, you can share this security camera with globally users 100% Wireless and IP65 waterproof, allowing it to withstand any weather and install anywhere Three instant alarm methods: siren, flashing white light and notification push Two-way talk , you can communicate with your family and friends in real time by camera , and you can warn off thieves AI motion detection, it can recognize a person, pet, vehicle and package by AI technique 1080P HD color night vision, you can see color image and video even though it’s in the night Customize activity zones, custom monitor multiple specified areas Support cloud and SD card storage

AI Motion Detection The security cameras wireless outdoor with advanced smart AI detection that can easily identify a person, pet, vehicle and package by AI technique, let you have more convenience. Long Battery Life and 100% Wire-Free This outdoor camera wireless can use 1-6 months for single charge. And it’s completely wireless, you can install it anywhere. Customize Activity Zones You can customize select specific activity areas to monitor through the mobile app, so you can reduce the amount of unnecessary push notifications.

Multiple Users Sharing This indoor/outdoor camera for home security can share multiple users globally at the same time, you can protect your home, take care of your baby and pet with your family together. Siren, Spotlight and Notification Push This outdoor security camera will siren an alarm, flashing white light and push an instant of notification to your mobile app when it detects an unusual motion. These alerts will effectively drive away thieves, you can also warn off thieves by 2-way audio. 1080P HD Color Night Vision The outside cameras security wireless with full color night vision and infrared night vision, the color night vision can provide you with a full color image and video than the ordinary night vision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and function!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was very impressed by the quality and performance of this little unit and especially with the fact that it is waterproof, as we have been having a crazy amount of rain recently and it has not interfered with the camera operation at all. It was quite easy to set up and was fully operational in no time. The camera is 100% wireless, so you can place it in just about any spot where it can stand on its own or you can mount it in a permanent position with the included mounting bracket. It is motion activated and will notify your phone when any motion is detected. There is also a built-in speaker that enables you to address any unwelcome visitors or to greet expected guests. There is a night vision feature and both day and night options have great resolution. There is a built in rolling 3-day storage, but you can also download the videos if you choose. If you need to store a longer timeframe, you can upgrade for just $2.99/mo. and that includes advanced features as well. It charges with a USB cord (included) and the charge can last up to 6 months depending on usage. From my photos you can see that we have temporarily placed it at the edge of our patio trying to catch a glimpse of what ever critter has been chewing on our chair cushions. You can see from the last shot that we now know what we are dealing with! To sum up, we are very pleased with this unit and would highly recommend it to all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Product, Great Quality, Easy Setup
reviews.reviewText: I have tested various cameras, including Ring, and without a doubt, I highly recommend Vision Well. This is a great quality product with a sleek design.Setting up the camera was an absolute breeze, thanks to its user-friendly instructions. In a mere five minutes, I had my device up and running smoothly. And the mobile app is very easy to navigate.The video and picture quality is great. Not only does it capture sharp visuals, but it also excels in low-light conditions. Unlike other recording devices that produce grayscale images, this camera provides colored nighttime footage. Additionally, its motion sensing capabilities are top-notch with accurate detection and reliable performance.One aspect that particularly stands out for me is the versatility in powering the device. This camera has three methods of power including: plug-in, a solar panel setup, or with the built-in battery. This flexibility allows you to place the camera anywhere without worrying about cords or wires.Vision Well is truly a great value, especially considering the rolling free 3-day cloud storage for videos. Additionally, there is an optional subscription-based package available, offering even more features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Vision Well Smart Battery Camera Model CG6S is a reliable and advanced security camera
reviews.reviewText: The Vision Well Smart Battery Camera Model CG6S is a dependable and sophisticated security camera with exceptional features and functionality. After using this camera for a time, I can certainly say that it lives up to its promises and provides peace of mind in terms of home security.The CG6S's smart battery technology is one of its most notable features. Its lengthy battery life provides continuous observation without the need for regular recharging. This is especially useful for individuals who wish to monitor their property without having to deal with complicated wiring or power outlets.The image quality of the camera is excellent, with clear and crisp video footage even in low-light circumstances. The high-definition resolution and wide-angle lens record a broad field of view, providing complete coverage of the surroundings.The CG6S also performs admirably in terms of connectivity and accessibility. It is readily connected to your smartphone or other smart devices, allowing you to remotely monitor your property. The companion smartphone app has an easy-to-use UI that allows for easy control and adjustment of settings.In terms of durability, the camera is designed to resist a variety of environmental situations, ensuring consistent performance even under extreme settings. Its solid build and IP65 waterproof rating give me confidence that it will continue to function properly for a long time.Overall, the Vision Well Smart Battery Camera Model CG6S is an excellent security camera with sophisticated features, dependable performance, and ease of use. Whether you want to improve your home security or keep an eye on your property while you're away, this camera provides the peace of mind and convenience you require.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for peace of mind and easy to set up. I have two and will buy more.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this small camera to monitor my front door for the past three weeks, and I'm delighted with its performance and image quality. The camera can be set to record when it's awake or asleep (in power-saving mode), and it's been able to capture every movement in the area while I've had it active. Even after three weeks, the battery has only decreased by 2%. During the first week, I received constant movement notifications because the camera was always on, and the sensor sensitivity was set to maximum. However, I learned that the sensor is very sensitive and works best at low sensitivity. My favorite feature is the night vision, which allows me to easily recognize who's at the door even in complete darkness from 15 feet away.Although more features are available with a paid subscription, the camera works perfectly fine for what I needed without any additional features. It has decent internal memory for short recordings, even without a memory card. I'm planning on purchasing more cameras for my property in the future!
